competition_summary.context: competition from insurance companies, technology companies and the financial services industry, as well as the shift away from traditional insurance markets; • Conditions that result in reduced insurer capacity; • Quarterly and annual variations in our commissions that result from the timing of policy renewals and the net effect of new and lost business production; • Intangible asset risk, including the possibility that our goodwill may become impaired in the future; • Future pandemics, epidemic
